channel.title: Legendscape Development Team
channel.description:
Hi guys This is Legendscape Development Team! Here is what ive done so far:
I have made a website just click the url to see it >>>> [url=http://legendscape.smfforfree.com/index.php]http://legendscape.smfforfree.com/index.php[/url] The website includes a chatbox, working ranks, a forum, working accounts, staff list, members list and all the stuuff that a website normally has
Here are the spots that I have:
[center]Owner: Poopoobear2 (me)-website owner Owner:*spot open*-Server owner (also the coder)[/center] [center]Co owner: Jacob- hes my bro Co-owner:*spot open*[/center] [center]Admins:* head spot open* Admin:*spot open* Admin*spot open* Admin:*spot open* [/center] [center]In-game Mods:*head spot open* In-game mod:*spot open* In-game mod:*spot open* In-game mod:*spot open*[/center] [center]Forun mods:*head spot open* Forum mod:*spot open* Forum mod:*spot open* Forum mod:*spot open*[/center] [center]Members: *unlimeted spots open*[/center] SO basiccly I am lookin for an experienced coder and a few staff (the server shud be a 317) And im hoping to get a webclient soon! apply for a spot!
I also have hamachi and team viewer my MSN is luke.coolboy@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Legendscape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

Why wouldn’t you be the owner of your own server. Your the Webmaster.

Wow you must be shit

Read full topic

item.title: Legendscape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:5, topic:374179”]Face-palm I’m Sorry buy Development Threads like these make my eyes bleed this is just a big messy wall of text. If you wouldn’t mind Clean this Up A bit maybe add some goals and screen-shots. and what you going to do to make your server unique after all this is YOUR server so you should take some pride in your thread.

Furthermore Good-Luck With the Development.[/quote]

Amen, BUT, GOOD LUCK. God bless this server project lol.

Read full topic

Hi guys This is Legendscape Development Team! Here is what ive done so far:

I have made a website just click the url to see it >>>> http://legendscape.smfforfree.com/index.php
The website includes a chatbox, working ranks, a forum, working accounts, staff list, members list and all the stuuff that a website normally has
